data.title: Shopping
data.text: This is the cutest boutique complete with a team room. There is clothing for both women and kids, jewelry, gifts and merchandise for the home.

data.title: Excellent
data.text: Very nice; limited menu but excellent food;Scott, outstanding waiter;sexist remark - fluff place - ladies love -  shopping all around. So guys make your lady happy and have lunch here

data.title: Must Shop and Eat
data.text:
This is a wonderful gift shop with an excellent restaurant and service to top it all off. The chicken salad trio is a must try and delish!! A vendor in the store sells the best coffee cake I have ever tasted. Grannys coffee cake I think. Keeps up to 1 year frozen and comes in the nicest little tin.  Actually, I gave it to my parents to keep from eating ALL OF IT !! A 
must see shop in the wonderful city of Waco TX  :)

data.title: Not impressed
data.text: A friend & I took a day trip to Waco to check out the new silos & do some shopping. After looking at reviews we decided to eat & shop at Sironia with high hopes. Unfortunately we were very disappointed. Keep in mind there were only two people in line ahead of us. There didn't appear to be a full time hostess stationed at the podium & waiters & waitresses kept walking past the line & not acknowledging anyone. We waited over 30 minutes to be seated. The service wasn't much better once seated. I don't know if they were short staffed or over full, but either way it wasn't addressed. We both ordered sandwiches & fruit. I had chicken salad. It wasn't very good. The pasta salad side had an odd dressing on it. Not my cup of tea. After we paid we walked around the shopping area of the store. Upstairs was antique/junk shopping, downstairs offered clothing, crafts & jewelry. We walked the whole store in 30 minutes. All in all pretty disappointing as the idea offers great potential.

data.title: Not worth the trip.
data.text: We were looking for things to do in Waco and this place was recommended. I would not recommend wasting your time trying to find it.  We didn't try the café but the shopping was suspect.

data.title: Great Burgers
data.text: This is not exactly the place to bring your husband if he doesn't like looking at cute little shops. I found this restaurant on-line and was very interested in the fact that I could shop and then sit down and eat lunch at a restaurant right there that had excellent reviews. My husband took one look at the outdoors of Sironia and decided that was not the place he wanted to eat. Well, we ended up dining there anyway. The Mushroom Swiss burgers were cooked to perfection. I particularly liked that the burgers weren't sandwiched between thick rolls that is so customary. The burgers were somewhat greasy but not extraordinarily so. You get one side with your selection, and I got the mashed potatoes. Suffice it to say, the mashed potatoes were bland and dry; there was no butter, no gravy, no sour cream, or anything to spice up the flavor. The restaurant does not offer French fries either; what's a burger without French fries? I had read about their desserts, but there was not much more than cakes and pies so we skipped dessert. The wait staff was friendly and helpful.If your husband doesn't like shopping, I'd say don't bring him. I really enjoyed the little shops though. I have found that when selling salsa, a display of samples is appropriate. My daughter wanted to buy the salsa but would not do so without sampling it first, especially since it is so pricey.

data.title: Ladies who lunch
data.text: Excellent chicken salad. I had the Uptown Trio with chicken salad, vermicelli salad, fruit salad & carrot muffins. All very good. And this looks like a great place to do some after-lunch shopping!

data.title: Love love this place
data.text: My go to place for everything from a fresh delicious lunch and awesome yummy desserts with awesome servers friendly and helpful. To one of a kind jewelry at design house, Texas cooking oils, gifts for everyone, cutiest baby items. Not to mention the heart of this place Holly and Martha who greet you with warmth and love when you enter the door and make your visit worth every minute your there. A must visit if your here to see Waco or just around the corner.

data.title: Plenty of little boutiques and a cafe under one roof
data.text: Lots of alcoves for those who love shopping from the minute you walk in, there is so much to see. The surprise was a café with 4 rooms and delicious food, friendly staff and a relaxing atmosphere.

data.title: Everything your heart desires
data.text: Sironia is a vast space filled with everything you can imagine.  This includes a café that serves delicious food with an element of class that Waco sorely needs. Highly recommend

data.title: Adorable shops with cafe in the middle
data.text: Although we didn't eat here at the café, the dessert display case had me drooling. There's cute little shops with mostly clothing but we found one in the back with old metal decorations and metal wall signs that we bought a few things.

data.title: Unique shopping in the middle of a cafe
data.text: Great place for lunch. You can shop, eat, shop some more. Great atmosphere. Don't forget to check out the upstairs for some unique ideas.

data.title: Just ok
data.text: We didn't really find anything at all. The restaurant wasn't open when we went so can't say anything about that. For all the great reviews I expected more.

data.title: Perfect Eat & Shop Spot or Dessert
data.text: Great dessert and charming stores! The food delivered to neighboring tables looked very good, and the people seemed to be enjoying them very much.  There are several interior shops that has a little bit of everything for a leisurely couple hour outing.  Very well done!

data.title: Fun shopping and food
data.text: Always love the good and friendly service. The shopping is always different and the prices great. Lunch is always delicious.  The chicken salad is wonderful and the muffins delicious!

data.title: Wonderful place to go with girl friends
data.text: My daughter and I visited Sironia for lunch and browsing in the lovely stores. What an enjoyable time we had. The lunch was very good but the dessert was fabulous! Oh my! The shops are very nice as well. A great way to spend time with friends or by yourself on a hot, Texas day! We will be back!

data.title: Interesting variety!
data.text: Enjoyed a quick perusal of Sironia and I can't wait to come back when they are serving lunch.  Lots of cute clothing options (especially for coeds) and I found some great jewelry pieces, both costume and fine jewelry.  Cafe looked good, but was closed during our visit.

data.title: Ladies day out on the town
data.text: This was a lovely place to dine and shop while in Waco.  The day we were there, it must have been grandmother's day because at every table was seated a group of "gently aging ladies with friends."  Our group of 5 enjoyed every bite, were happy with the friendly wait staff, and delighted in our shopping choices in every nook and cranny around this unique place!

data.title: A special Valentine's surprise
data.text:
Hubby and I went on an exploring trip to Waco to find some goodies.  We only knew of Waco as the home of the Baylor Bears and I-35 goes through it.  So, off the beaten path we went to explore.  We walked into Sironia just expecting to shop (TONS of interesting goodies!) but since it was lunch time we decided to eat there as well.  

WHAT a jewel of a place to eat!  The staff was friendly, the food was wonderful and the atmosphere was pleasant. Hubby got a tuna sandwich and salad.  I got a club sandwich (I think).  Anyway, it was wonderful.  But the highlight was the DESSERT.  OMG.  They have a baker in house that does all their desserts from scratch. OH MY.  We shared a slice of chocolate pecan pie.  Pure Pecan Heaven is what I would call it!!!   I would go there just to eat dessert!!!  YUMMMM.

data.title: Gift store
data.text: Great store for gifts!  Nice tea room.  Lots of baby clothes and jewlery. Went to magnolias and recommended by them
